document.full_text: a potential breakthrough heart valve from edwards lifesciences corp that can spare patients from chest-cracking, open heart surgery will take center stage at one of the year's most important heart meetings this weekend.
document.title: all eyes on new heart valve at medical meeting
lines_and_colors: a potential breakthrough heart valve from edwards lifesciences corp that can spare patients from chest-cracking, open heart surgery will take center stage at one of the year's most important heart meetings this weekend.
